name: bottles
description:
A game about finding bottles in a reservoir. Made in about two days as part of Game Dev Unlocked - Game Jam #4. Takes a few minutes to play.

Game controls

Only works with a keyboard and mouse. I didn't have time to make fancy menus.

Move W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys Interact Left Mouse Button CrouchControl About the project

This game was made during the Game Dev Unlocked - Game Jam #4. The theme was Underwater. This was my second time participating in a game jam and I was reminded how little you can do in a short amount of time. I'm not totally happy with the gameplay aspect of it -- especially since you have the lungs of a god. I am happy with how the story came together though.

My creative goal was to create something visually striking that involves water. My technical goals were to make a game using URP and an event based architecture in Unity.

If you feel inclined to toss any coins my way, rest assured they'll be used to fund future games.

To follow along and learn about new games, follow me here on Itch or find me at: https://twitter.com/geoffa
